WRITING.TEXT: Swear down. It isn't built yet and there were two Croatian men building it. We asked and they said it was ok. I can provide proof if needed but they are filming GoT in Dubrovnik right now. I also met Brienne today so check my profile.

WRITING.TITLE: We found a Game Of Thrones Season 4 set piece in Dubrovnik, Croatia
TIL The famous "Margherti" scene from Inglorious Basterds is a reference to the director of "Cannibal Apocalypse" Antonio Marghereti. He is also a character in the game Dead Island.

WRITING.TEXT: I thought it was a solid summer blockbuster and was surprised at how much I enjoyed myself. I had read a few reviews and the concept interested me so I gave it a watch. The plot, characters and setting were able to hold my attention throughout the film and I thought the ending was probably one of the best Disney have ever done.
